column1: https://www.tripadvisor.com/COVID-2019You have already noticed this. TA has opened its own "What you need to know" web site.
I hope it means we'd see less topics about COVID-19 here :-)
The top orange banner appears first when you enter forum, however, one may often scroll down soon as hfots says. Also, it doesn't appear on mobile app. That's why I posted the link here explicitly.
